column1: I am IVAAL! Your Interactive Virtual Artificial Assistant Lodestar!
Here to assist you in... well... this!
I am sure I do not need to explain how this job works, you seem sooo very competent!
However, there is a memo from our High Lord Bexos himself! Let us read;
A breach in the system has been discovered within our mainframe.
The multipartite virus has been dealt with and is under control, but...
any further incidents should be reported immediately. Thank you.
A multipartite virus? Whatever that is, I am sure we have nothing to worry about!
Oh! There are jobs in the queue already!
We have no time for further training, we are such a busy company!
Why not start with the trucks?
